alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:21PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Otero, west central Prowers and central Bent Counties through MIDNIGHT MDT... At 1120 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of John Martin Reservoir to 6 miles south of Swink. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Las Animas, Swink and John Martin Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
